step_data.thought: Based on the current page accessibility tree, I can see I'm already on the 'New Cart Price Rule' page, which is part of the Promotions section under Marketing. This is exactly where I need to be to create a new promotional campaign. I can see form fields for creating a new cart price rule (promotion), including Rule Name, Description, Active status, Websites, Customer Groups, etc. The user's goal was to navigate to the Marketing section to create a new promotional campaign, which I have successfully done. I should inform the user that we've reached the destination and they can now proceed with creating their promotional campaign by filling out the form.
step_data.action: stop('You have successfully navigated to the New Cart Price Rule page under Marketing > Promotions. You can now create your new promotional campaign by filling out the form with your campaign details.')
